page.title: 03FARMING: CHILLERTON FARM
page.content: {Chillerton Farm}is a mixed farm covering 240 acres. Wheat, barley, maize and grass are grown. Animals kept are: 1000 sheep, 20 cows, 60 calves, 9 goats, 3 dogs and 1 cat. The workforce consists of the farmer, his wife and a labourer.They use tractors, harvesters, muck and fertiliser spreaders and a mower. The Georgian Farmhouse dates from the 18th. Cent. {CRIDMORE FARM: }is one of a group of farms managed by Mr.C. Clarke of { {CRIDMORE FARM CO. LTD.}His parents have lived in the farmhouse since 1952 with a ghost called "Charlie". Other farms in the group are Lower Rill, Little Cridmore and North Appleford. {Cridmore}is a mixed farm;they have 120 Guernsey or Jersey cows and grow grass and cereal crops. 6 people work on the farm and keep a horse, pony,2 donkeys, 2 llamas, 2 geese, 2 dogs and 3 cats.
